> Looks like all the supports are getting base stat buffs.  Oh hey!  What did Leona get?
> 
> Leona
> Eclipse (W) bonus armor increased from 20/30/40/50/60 to 25/35/45/55/65
> 
> Why is Leona not getting a large base armor buff?  Why only +5 armor in her ability?  Alistar gets a 20 armor buff on his BASE stats and Leona gets a 5 bonus armor on her W?  Could I get some context as to why Leona is being denied a base stat increase like all the other supports?  Am I just missing the increase somewhere?  I can't seem to find any information on Leona getting more then this in PBE at this time.

replies.body: Leona's also getting 20 armor. Not sure why that's not showing up in PBE datamining, just checked and definitely seeing it in game at present.
Yall need to contact the S@20 team and give them something nice. they earned it many times over.
i swear i looked a few times and never saw anything. ill add to today's post!

Out of curiosity, why +20 armor instead of a split Armor/AD buff ala Thresh? I remember it was stated in in her mini-rework that she needed more stuff to do after going in and using her combo, and giving her a bit more sustained damage seems like it would fit that goal rather well.
thresh is a he... not a she...
He's talking about LEONA and how she should get less armor but more AD like Thresh.

I see Zyra but does fiddle support not get anything?  Already not the strongest pick anywhere.(including jungle.)  brand also got buffed differently.  Don't really see him anywhere on the fixing list.  Just wondering if he was going to be indirectly nerfed as support?

Mid he takes AD runes to help with last hitting because it bad and slow
Jungle he used AC / AP to take less damage from mobs or heal/damage more with drain
support everyone getting buff but him

Just seems like he is getting behind father in every lane.  None of the new things really "scream" fiddle either.....

Im looking at the PBE and i see leona's level 1 armor is 27. is that correct? 

It's the same on live and PBE at the moment, so im not sure
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

im pretty sure they balance out over the course of the game, leo base stats + W passive/active should give her similar or more armor stats similar to the other sup stats. but idk haha just a thought of mine

Edit: i forgot about her increased MR aswell from W

5 armor on W will never equal 20 armor on base.  I would also point out that W cannot be up permanently where as 20 base armor is.  Also, if W scaling is an issue then why did Taric get +20 armor as well?
Because Taric is fabulous. Simple.
Fair enough lol.
Pretty sure skills are meants to be things that you have as an edge not just to make up for your weak base stats

Wanna look at {{champion:14}} and tell me that again? {{champion:15}}  and {{champion:18}}  have similar HP @ level 1 but even more HP per level. 

He and Mordekaiser have bottom tier HP growth higher than only about 5 champions one of which is Kled withOUT Skaarl. 
On that note, {{champion:82}} 's HP is also low because of his passive shield giving him 125% effective health, and also because his highest stats are his list of bugs and his base AD (that has almost no use).
That is balanceing because their passives and shields more than make up for their lower hp.
Yeah this is extremely odd. Pretty sure every other tank is getting +20 armor to compensate for the removal of runes.
Leona is one of my favorite champions too so it makes me very sad.  I'm hoping its just an overlooked thing and she will get them soon enough.
I do think so. In earlier versions of these base stat buffs they sometimes forgot something. Either that or the surr@20 post could have accidentally missed it.
I'm pretty sure it's just Surrenderat20 forgetting to put it, but she has the 20 base armor bonus.
She almost knocked out a Korean team. We can't have that :nerfhammer:
PS why does Bard still have the HP levels of a melee champion?
Because he has 2 damaging abilities. He needs some numbers SOMEWHERE to be able to fight at all.

1. win rate difference between coordinated plays solo queue is extremely different for {{champion:432}} cuz that's what his kit is about. Given that, it's really hard for riot to justify nerfs on {{champion:432}} . ~~besides, he has soo much potential for flashy plays on LC$~~

2. {{champion:432}} 's aa range is only 500, and his only damaging ability among QWER doesnt have much range either, unlike champs such as {{champion:15}} . And his kit doesn't revolve on staying behind the ADC like pre"nerf" {{champion:40}} . So he does need either more damage or durability. And if riot wants to keep him a support instead of ADC, then bard's getting durability among the two choices.

I actually played Leona on PBE, and i know she is getting 80HP off the changes. How much are the other tanks getting? Maybe they gave her HP instead of Armor because of her early aggresion for trades? I mean if they all are getting 80 then idk.

> [{quoted}](name=Skorch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yeu4hcPg,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-10-26T03:47:34.447+0000)

Most tanks are getting 20 armor. I doubt 80 health is enough to be equal to that amount of armor, but health is probably better on Leona because of her w.

For Braum's Stand Behind Me, they buffed the percentage slightly because it scales off of bonus armor. Just increasing his base armor wouldn't put the spell at the same strength after the removal of runes. Taric's w doesn't need a buff because it goes off of total armor. They gave riven a slight buff to her w and e for the same reason.

I remember her getting it in a previous PBE update. She didn't receive her W buff yet. I remember it because Braum received the armor and W buff while Leona only received the armor buff. I think it's just something they forgot.

I wish they'd never said they would do these base stat compensation buffs. They should of just removed runes and let all champs have their normal base stats and see where the chips fall before buffing any champions.

Blame the jungle. 
They're the ones affected the most. That and last hitting patterns people have spent 7 years or so getting used to.

I agree with this because really damage would have suffered more than defense because defense scales off. it would slow down the game and that is probaly why it they had to compensate damage and why defense is getting less compensation.
exciting lcs games my ass previous slower seasons saw more than 2 fights the a game and even saw in lane fights unlike this season.
agreed. This is probably the only and one chance Riot would have at dealing with the stat creeps.

I just want Shield of Daybreak to trigger her Sunlight passive on Jungle monsters, and Zenith Blade to deal a bit of bonus damage and treat them as a Champion. Jungle Leona (and {{champion:143}} }} are fantasies of mine.

Honestly i want her to be able to proc her own passive or get ad scaling.

Toplane Leo would benefit from it too then. Which is also quite fun.
I'm just happy they're giving Rakan some more AD. He's awesome but when you get the opportunity to poke with him it feels so unsatisfying.
More concerned with Rakkans base armor...wtf he was already way too tanky early.
Its 3 more armor than he has on Live, unless he takes scaling HP runes (or worse; flat HP). Not really a buff.

Leona's armor was 47 before they took Runes Reforged off last week, so if it isn't back in yet it's probably going to be back in soon.

As for why they're changing Eclipse, it's because the 20 armor she's gaining is treated as base armor when it used to be bonus armor from runes, so her Eclipse would be a bit weaker than on live without the bonus scaling. They're giving a little base to help even that out.
I dont think theyve finished doing all the small buffs yet (the buffs for rune loss)
My Triforce bruiser blitzcrank looks forward to further dominating the top lane using all this free armor.

They've been doing a lot of stat changes, and I've had trouble keeping track of them myself.

Is it possible that they've already given her some base armor and these champs were just all follow up after that? Even if that *isn't* what's going on, it's possible that there is a good explanation and/or they will buff her later if she needs help. They might just be thinking about giving her a base armor nerf on the current patch, but just not buffing her armor for the runes rework is equally effective.

How does her current base armor stack up to other tank supports like Ali and Braum?
